item.title: Thank You to the Stack Overflow Community for Ranking Docker the Most Used,Â Desired, and Admired Developer Tool
item.description: Thank you to the community for recognizing Docker as the most-used and most-desired developer tool for the second consecutive year, and for elevating Docker to be the most-admired. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-stack-overflow-survey-thank-you-2024/
